short_summary: Elevator inspection maintenance and repair services
description: Elevator inspection maintenance and repair services including mat, tools, equipment, and labour for CANADIAN PUBLIC WORKS across the 5 CDSB Gagetown area with possible extension for two additional years
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Contract Details

### Title
W6898-240662 - RFP Inspection, Maintenance and Repair of Elevators

### Publication and Closing Dates
*   Publication Date: 2024-02-07
*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-27 14:00:00

### Contract Details

The Government of Canada seeks to enter into a Service Contract with a contractor for the provision of inspection, maintenance, and repair services for elevators, vertical wheelchair and attendant platform lifts, and dumbwaiters. These services are required at 5 Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Gagetown and various armories in New Brunswick and Prince Edward Island.

### Contract Period
The contract is expected to commence on April 1st, 2024, with an initial term of one (1) year, and may be extended for two (2) additional years, up to March 31st, 2026.

### Key Services

*   Inspection, maintenance, and repair of elevators, including regular technical assessments and scheduling of necessary repairs
*   Provision of necessary material, tools, and equipment
*   Labour services for the maintenance and repair of elevators

### Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the Lowest Price method.

### Eligibility
This contract is open to all qualified contractors who can provide the required services.

### Trade Agreements
The procuring entity reserves the right to consider eligibility under specific trade agreements.

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Adam Beaumaster (SPAC/PSPC)
adam\.beaumaster\@tpsgc\-pwgsc\.gc\.ca

### Notice and Documentation

To obtain the full RFx package, please visit:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18737713?extsite=MTg3Mzc3MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
